page-title: Le Chat à Paillettes • Lucía Petit, Frontend Developer
intro-txt: I enjoy challenges and learning new things. I live with two cats.
ListenToMe-txt: End-of-course project developed using React, Redux, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS on the frontend, and Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL on the backend. The design is responsive and includes a dark mode.
response: You will get a response as soon as possible.
